ygData.subject: RE: Brazen Brass Kilij (was Stats and Jewelry)
ygData.msgSnippet: Could a group of 6 level 20 or so take out the SG?  If so what would be the best way to tell if it was the low level one or a full grown SG?  I d love to get a
ygData.messageBody:
Could a group of 6 level 20 or so take out the SG? If so what would be the
best way to tell if it was the low level one or a full grown SG? I'd love
to get a real magical 1HS weapon and can't stand the look of a tomahawk in
my hand. Whips are also silly, "A game of billiards anyone?"

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 1:41 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Brazen Brass Kilij (was Stats and Jewelry)


From: jhenders@...

On Thu, Oct 07/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
<Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> 1h slashing, damage 10 delay 35. scimitar look. its a quest given by an
> npc near the druid hall in kelethin. kill a mid20s sand giant (not named)
in
> south ro, get Kijil's plans, bring to the npc with 3 bars of enchanted
gold.

What's really funny is, dispite being a scimitar and having the quest
giver near the Druid guild, druids can't use it.
